name: ad-insertion
description: A custon PHP application for The Kern Valley Sun.

scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:icons
scripts.update: git submodule update --init --recursive && npm run build:all
scripts.test: npm run lint:php && npm run lint:js
scripts.hook:post-merge: touch .git/hooks/post-merge && echo '#!/bin/sh' > .git/hooks/post-merge && echo 'npm run update' >> .git/hooks/post-merge && chmod u+x .git/hooks/post-merge
scripts.hook:pre-push: touch .git/hooks/pre-push && echo '#!/bin/sh' > .git/hooks/pre-push && echo 'npm test' >> .git/hooks/pre-push && chmod u+x .git/hooks/pre-push
scripts.git:hooks: npm run hook:pre-commit && npm run hook:post-merge && npm run hook:pre-push
scripts.postinstall: npm run git:hooks && npm run update
